ThingDef.description: energy cartridge for crucible weapons.
ThingDef.label: energy cartridge
crucible rifle
ThingDef.description: The Arms Dynamics "Pacificator" crucible rifle, the standard issue rifle of the notorious Federation Peacekeepers. This rifle fires focused energy bolt that vaporise everything in their path. It has does however have a relatively slow fire late due to possible overheating.

ThingDef.label: crucible pistol
ThingDef.description: Arms Dynamics "Negotiator" is an crucible pistol with an unconventional fire mechanism called "the energy crucible". The negotiator's vulnerable point is its painfully slow rate of fire for a pistol. However, its fire power and high accuracy offset this flaw.

ThingDef.label: crucible precision rifle
ThingDef.description: The favored weapon of the Federation Peacebringer assassin corps, Arms Dynamics "Intercessor" is a long range energy weapon. Although Intercessor's firepower is slightly lower than a conventional sniper rifle, it's high accuracy and longer range makes the Intercessor a most fearsome weapon.
energy cartridge used in the heat cannon.
ThingDef.label: energy cartridge (heat)
heat cannon
ThingDef.description: The Arms Dynamics "Arbiter". In the Federation, use of the Arbiter was rigorously controlled; As such, This incendiary energy weapon is reserved for Federation Peacemongers, the most capable of the already able Peacekeepers of the Federation.
energy cartridge for plasma weapons.
ThingDef.label: energy cartridge (plasma)
plasma caster
ThingDef.description: The last argument of the Federation, the "Axiom" is the most infamous weapon available to the corps. A plasma sphere from the Axiom is a very slow and easy to avoid projectile. However, just one shot from a Axiom can ruin an entire building.

ThingDef.label: tactical pistol
ThingDef.description: A Greydale Defense "Lynx". Light and easy to use, ideal personal defense weapon.

ThingDef.label: tactical carbine
ThingDef.description: A Greydale Defense "panther" general purpose rifle platform. This is a carbine model.

ThingDef.label: marksman rifle
ThingDef.description: A Greydale Defense "panther" general purpose rifle platform. This is a marksman rifle model.

ThingDef.label: support machinegun
ThingDef.description: A Greydale Defense "panther" general purpose rifle platform. This is a LMG model.

ThingDef.label: grenade launcher
ThingDef.description: Designed by Greydale Defense, the "Jaguar" is a simple but effective indirect fire support weapon.

ThingDef.label: HV SMG
ThingDef.description: The "Caracal" is a SMG that manufactured by Graydale Defence. It was designed for close assault and fires special small calibre high velocity cartridges that can penetrate armour.
cartridge for molten metal weapons.
ThingDef.label: energy cartridge (moltenmetal)
molten rifle
ThingDef.description: A "Hrunting" molten rifle, manufactured by Jotun Interstellar. This weapon fires molten metal as its bullet. The designer of the Hrunting was never concerned about ascetics. What he focused on was just pure fire power.

ThingDef.label: molten pistol
ThingDef.description: A "Trollsverd" is a heavy pistol made by Jotun Interstellar. Fires a molten metal alloy, fire from a Trollbane can solve most of lonely colonies problems.

ThingDef.label: AMR Anti Mechanoid Rifle
ThingDef.description: A Jotun Interstellar's "Gramr" anti-mechanoid rifle. As heavy as a small truck and just as hard to wield, the recoil from a Gramr is as strong as the kick from a mule. But the firepower justifies everything.
cartridge for siege shotgun.
ThingDef.label: energy cartridge (siege shotgun)
siege shotgun
ThingDef.description: This oversized shotgun is the Jotun Interstellar "Fafnir", Made by splinting multiple AA gun barrel's together. The Fafnir is a weapon used to fight against mechanoids in urban warfare. If a person was to accidently take a burst from this siege shotgun, they would be instantly turned into sticky red mist.
cartridge for suppressor cannon.
ThingDef.label: energy cartridge (suppressor cannon)
suppressor cannon
ThingDef.description: The "Muspell" suppressor cannon is a Jotun Interstellar's answer to small "crawler" type mechanoid swarm. The Muspell ceaselessly fires super heated metal fragments.

ThingDef.label: siege gun
ThingDef.description: The legacy of a grim mechanoid war, Jotun Interstellar's the "Grendel" siege gun is a one of the most formidable man-portable siege weapons acrosss the galaxy.

ThingDef.label: shard rifle
ThingDef.description: Compared to a conventional assault rifle, the Yunwha Precision 'Seoli(Frost)' shard rifle is equipped with a larger clip and a higher rate of fire.

ThingDef.label: dual wield shard pistols
ThingDef.description: A pair of Yunhwa Precision "SeolHwa(Snow blossom)" pistols. The SeolHwa has an extremely short range but while within close range the pistol can tear enemies to pieces.
cartridge for nanotech swarmer.
ThingDef.label: energy cartridge (nanotech swarmer)
nanotech swarmer
ThingDef.description: The Yunhwa Precision 'SagPung(Boreas)' swarmer is the short range nanotech weapon. It shoots intelligent nano swarm as its bullet. Fast and incredibly accurate, it is an ideal tool for dealing with soft targets at close range.
cartridge for spike rifle.
ThingDef.label: energy cartridge (spike rifle)
spike rifle
ThingDef.description: Yunhwa precision's 'SangAe(Frost haze)'. Unlike more common rifles, the frost haze fires armor piercing spikes of carbon crystal.
cartridge for microwave emmiter.
ThingDef.label: energy cartridge (microwave emmiter)
microwave emmiter
ThingDef.description: Yunhwa Precision "GeugGwang(Aurora)" is a millimeter wave source that boils the water in the target's skin and thus causes incapacitating pain. It is a perfect crowd control weapon.

ThingDef.Name: BaseEquipment
ThingDef.label: equipment lacks label
ThingDef.description: Equipment lacks desc.

ThingDef.label: microwave grenades
ThingDef.description: Yunhwa Precision "BaegYa(white night)" microwave grenades. This small device emit the painful millimeter wave for a brief time. It is a surprisingly effective crowd control weapon.

ThingDef.label: Satchel charge
ThingDef.description: A "Dunder" Satchel charge. Combat engineer's best friend.

ThingDef.label: plasma grenade
ThingDef.description: "Repose" plasma grenades. Plasma grenade packs more punch than the standard frag grenade but It lacks of blast radius of conventional one.

ThingDef.label: mini grenade
ThingDef.description: "Bobcat" mini grenades. Due to its small size, a considerable number could be carried.
